thread.title: Iman Pays Tribute to David Bowie As Singer's Birthday, One-Year Anniversary of His Death Approaches
thread.title_full: Iman Pays Tribute to David Bowie As Singer's Birthday, One-Year Anniversary of His Death Approaches

author: Jennifer Drysdale
title: Iman Pays Tribute to David Bowie As Singer's Birthday, One-Year Anniversary of His Death Approaches
text: Iman Pays Tribute to David Bowie As Singer's Birthday, One-Year Anniversary of His Death Approaches by Jennifer Drysdale 5:58   Getty Images Iman will never forget her late husband, David Bowie. The 61-year-old supermodel took to Instagram on Friday to remember Bowie with a sweet black-and-white photo, just two days before what would have been his 70th birthday, and four days before the one-year anniversary of his death. A photo posted by IMAN (@the_real_iman) on Jan 6, 2017 at 1:55pm PST RELATED: Iman Shares Birthday Wishes For Her and David Bowie's Daughter Lexi Iman and Bowie married in 1992, before welcoming their daughter, Alexandria "Lexi" Zahra Jones in 2000. Bowie died on Jan. 10, 2016, after a private 18-month battle with cancer. He was 69. In June, Iman shared a heartbreaking photo of herself and Bowie, on what would have been their 24th wedding anniversary. "June 6th... 24th wedding anniversary #foreverlove" the model captioned the photo, with the words "The best thing about me is you," written over the snap. A photo posted by IMAN (@the_real_iman) on Jun 6, 2016 at 3:41am PDT
